00047 #ifndef PTLRPC_GSS_KRB5_H
00048 #define PTLRPC_GSS_KRB5_H
00049 
00050 /*
00051  * RFC 4142
00052  */
00053 
00054 #define KG_USAGE_ACCEPTOR_SEAL          22
00055 #define KG_USAGE_ACCEPTOR_SIGN          23
00056 #define KG_USAGE_INITIATOR_SEAL         24
00057 #define KG_USAGE_INITIATOR_SIGN         25
00058 
00059 #define KG_TOK_MIC_MSG                  0x0404
00060 #define KG_TOK_WRAP_MSG                 0x0504
00061 
00062 #define FLAG_SENDER_IS_ACCEPTOR         0x01
00063 #define FLAG_WRAP_CONFIDENTIAL          0x02
00064 #define FLAG_ACCEPTOR_SUBKEY            0x04
00065 
00066 struct krb5_header {
00067         __u16           kh_tok_id;      /* token id */
00068         __u8            kh_flags;       /* acceptor flags */
00069         __u8            kh_filler;      /* 0xff */
00070         __u16           kh_ec;          /* extra count */
00071         __u16           kh_rrc;         /* right rotation count */
00072         __u64           kh_seq;         /* sequence number */
00073         __u8            kh_cksum[0];    /* checksum */
00074 };
00075 
00076 struct krb5_keyblock {
00077         rawobj_t                 kb_key;
00078         struct crypto_blkcipher *kb_tfm;
00079 };
00080 
00081 struct krb5_ctx {
00082         unsigned int            kc_initiate:1,
00083                                 kc_cfx:1,
00084                                 kc_seed_init:1,
00085                                 kc_have_acceptor_subkey:1;
00086         __s32                   kc_endtime;
00087         __u8                    kc_seed[16];
00088         __u64                   kc_seq_send;
00089         __u64                   kc_seq_recv;
00090         __u32                   kc_enctype;
00091         struct krb5_keyblock    kc_keye;        /* encryption */
00092         struct krb5_keyblock    kc_keyi;        /* integrity */
00093         struct krb5_keyblock    kc_keyc;        /* checksum */
00094         rawobj_t                kc_mech_used;
00095 };
00096 
00097 enum sgn_alg {
00098         SGN_ALG_DES_MAC_MD5           = 0x0000,
00099         SGN_ALG_MD2_5                 = 0x0001,
00100         SGN_ALG_DES_MAC               = 0x0002,
00101         SGN_ALG_3                     = 0x0003, /* not published */
00102         SGN_ALG_HMAC_MD5              = 0x0011, /* microsoft w2k; no support */
00103         SGN_ALG_HMAC_SHA1_DES3_KD     = 0x0004
00104 };
00105 
00106 enum seal_alg {
00107         SEAL_ALG_NONE                 = 0xffff,
00108         SEAL_ALG_DES                  = 0x0000,
00109         SEAL_ALG_1                    = 0x0001, /* not published */
00110         SEAL_ALG_MICROSOFT_RC4        = 0x0010, /* microsoft w2k; no support */
00111         SEAL_ALG_DES3KD               = 0x0002
00112 };
00113 
00114 #define CKSUMTYPE_CRC32                 0x0001
00115 #define CKSUMTYPE_RSA_MD4               0x0002
00116 #define CKSUMTYPE_RSA_MD4_DES           0x0003
00117 #define CKSUMTYPE_DESCBC                0x0004
00118 /* des-mac-k */
00119 /* rsa-md4-des-k */
00120 #define CKSUMTYPE_RSA_MD5               0x0007
00121 #define CKSUMTYPE_RSA_MD5_DES           0x0008
00122 #define CKSUMTYPE_NIST_SHA              0x0009
00123 #define CKSUMTYPE_HMAC_SHA1_DES3        0x000c
00124 #define CKSUMTYPE_HMAC_SHA1_96_AES128   0x000f
00125 #define CKSUMTYPE_HMAC_SHA1_96_AES256   0x0010
00126 #define CKSUMTYPE_HMAC_MD5_ARCFOUR      -138
00127 
00128 /* from gssapi_err_krb5.h */
00129 #define KG_CCACHE_NOMATCH                        (39756032L)
00130 #define KG_KEYTAB_NOMATCH                        (39756033L)
00131 #define KG_TGT_MISSING                           (39756034L)
00132 #define KG_NO_SUBKEY                             (39756035L)
00133 #define KG_CONTEXT_ESTABLISHED                   (39756036L)
00134 #define KG_BAD_SIGN_TYPE                         (39756037L)
00135 #define KG_BAD_LENGTH                            (39756038L)
00136 #define KG_CTX_INCOMPLETE                        (39756039L)
00137 #define KG_CONTEXT                               (39756040L)
00138 #define KG_CRED                                  (39756041L)
00139 #define KG_ENC_DESC                              (39756042L)
00140 #define KG_BAD_SEQ                               (39756043L)
00141 #define KG_EMPTY_CCACHE                          (39756044L)
00142 #define KG_NO_CTYPES                             (39756045L)
00143 
00144 /* per Kerberos v5 protocol spec crypto types from the wire. 
00145  * these get mapped to linux kernel crypto routines.  
00146  */
00147 #define ENCTYPE_NULL            0x0000
00148 #define ENCTYPE_DES_CBC_CRC     0x0001        /* DES cbc mode with CRC-32 */
00149 #define ENCTYPE_DES_CBC_MD4     0x0002        /* DES cbc mode with RSA-MD4 */
00150 #define ENCTYPE_DES_CBC_MD5     0x0003        /* DES cbc mode with RSA-MD5 */
00151 #define ENCTYPE_DES_CBC_RAW     0x0004        /* DES cbc mode raw */
00152 /* XXX deprecated? */
00153 #define ENCTYPE_DES3_CBC_SHA    0x0005        /* DES-3 cbc mode with NIST-SHA */
00154 #define ENCTYPE_DES3_CBC_RAW    0x0006        /* DES-3 cbc mode raw */
00155 #define ENCTYPE_DES_HMAC_SHA1   0x0008
00156 #define ENCTYPE_DES3_CBC_SHA1   0x0010
00157 #define ENCTYPE_AES128_CTS_HMAC_SHA1_96 0x0011
00158 #define ENCTYPE_AES256_CTS_HMAC_SHA1_96 0x0012
00159 #define ENCTYPE_ARCFOUR_HMAC    0x0017
00160 #define ENCTYPE_ARCFOUR_HMAC_EXP 0x0018
00161 #define ENCTYPE_UNKNOWN         0x01ff
00162 
00163 #endif /* PTLRPC_GSS_KRB5_H */
